title: Project Lucian Bug

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of PROJECT: Lucian with ingame gameplay! Check out the PROJECT T-Shirt!: http://bit.ly/PROJECTWeapons Riot have kicked League of Legends into overdrive with these new PROJECT Skins! Price: 1350RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as PROJECT: Lucian, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle.

body:
There is a bug I found a while ago on my friend's PBE account, and this video confirms what I saw does apply to the general community. 
If you watch the video in slow motion, basically the model's motion for Lucian's passive double shot is alright, but the orange animation of the shots both only come from his right gun. But I know when he doubleshots he tends to puts his gun side by side so it's hard to tell when the animation is thick like this skin. Maybe this is already fixed on the PBE because I played him a week or two ago.

Maybe give this a look Rioters? Just want a good bug-less skin for him XD

replies.body:
Hey DoubleEdgedFang! 

This is an issue that's actually been occurring since Lucian's launch. We're currently looking into the animation issue and are looking to resolve the issue. Unfortunately, this will not be fixed for PROJECT: Lucian's launch. (Sorry!)
Ah i see, funny how I didn't realize this XD Thanks tho
